org.lenskit.util.io

Class LineStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.util.io.AbstractObjectStream<String>
      • org.lenskit.util.io.LineStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<String>, java.util.stream.BaseStream<String,java.util.stream.Stream<String>>, java.util.stream.Stream<String>, ObjectStream<String>

    public class LineStream
extends AbstractObjectStream<String>

    Stream that reads lines from a file.

    Since:
    0.10
